name: Reason
description:
Reason is a game where you wander around an endless forest in search for a big pink weeping willow.
It's also a game about falling into depression.

Based on my own experiences with the illness, I wanted to simulate the feeling of falling into depression.
This game is the result.

A big thanks to Stef Colruyt and my teachers.

Controls: WASD or arrow keys to move, mouse to look around
